snippet.title: Epiko Regal Cinematic Trailer - The Kingdom of Epic Legends
snippet.description:
We are excited to invite you to join us in our quest to build the Epiko an innovative blockchain and gaming project developed by Wharf Street Studios.  We aim to introduce the wonders of mythologies to a global audience with a unique ecosystem of Games, Metaverse, and NFTs. We are offering a range of exciting products in our Epiko ecosystem for you to explore - Epikoregal, Epikoverse, Epiko.market, Epikovalley, Epikomerch, and Epikotoken.

Epiko Regal –  Our flagship, PvP tower defense mobile game for Android and iOS with real-time users and AI bots. You have access to unique experiences in the form of cinematic comics, strategic games, and augmented reality collectibles.

We are also launching Epikoverse, our own blockchain-powered metaverse. That will offer an immersive mystical metaverse full of fun activities, puzzles, and missions with geo-locations virtual rooms, and portals in which you will be able to roam with your choice of avatars.

Join us in our Play to Earn tournaments, Airdrops, and Giveaways to Win Exciting Prizes and be part of the Epiko revolution in creating a truly immersive gaming experience.

Questions? Reach out to us!
If you have any questions regarding Epiko, please feel free to contact us. Join Epiko — Discord Server To stay up to date with all of Epiko’s exciting developments, Get in touch with other members and be part of community conversations.

Become part of Epiko
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wss.epikoregal
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/epiko-regal/id1576311776

Epiko Official Links: https://linktr.ee/the_epiko 
(Twitter | Discord | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook | LinkedIn | Youtube | Medium)

NFT Collection: Epiko.market | OpenSea

Website: www.epiko.io
Whitepaper: https://www.epikoregal.com/assets/pdf/Whitepaper2.pdf
